title: Superpig!
description: When Pig's best friend Raj is suddenly taken ill, Pig has to get him to hospital very, very quickly. With the help of a wheelbarrow, an empty bus lane and a few friends and family, Pig manages it - and saves Raj from a fate worse than death (OK, not really). For once Pig does it all right, and even the doctors call him Superpig! Boys love PIG! Peter Ian Green has another hilarious adventure in this book, one of the bestselling series 'PIG' by Barbara Catchpole. Coupled with fantastic black-and-white illustrations and an easy-to-read diary format, the laugh-out-loud humour and tale of friendship will appeal to all readers.
author: Barbara  Catchpole
